creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: image is a gold full moon against a teal blue sky; darker teal reeds across lower half; a few white seedheads around moon and some red leaves to the right of moon; gold and red floral brocade bordering image; tan floral brocade and top and bottom of mount; ivory roller; natural wood futomaki roller cover; natural wood box with lid and yellow cloth wrap, and box paper covered with light green and white rough woven fabric
inscription: lid verso:　昭和三七年夏日作　　 龍子昇　　brown seal: 川端; lid recto: 月
markings: black ink mark on top of box lid; paper label on end of box: SOTHEBY\'S / NEW YORK / 16 / 7020 ; black seal: 遊神堂装潢
signed: signed Ryushi with one seal Ryushi; signature and seal underside lid of storage box
title: Moon
